 HOW TO BUY $FUFU - Create a metamask wallet

To get started, download Metamask or select a wallet from the list below to
create your own wallet:
Coinbase Wallet
MetaMask
TrustWallet
Please make sure to verify that you are on the correct website before clicking
any links or engaging in cryptocurrency activities to avoid falling victim to
scams. Stay vigilant and protect yourself!

BUY ETHEREUM

To buy $FUFU, you need to possess ETH. Obtain ETH by purchasing it from
various centralized exchanges like Coinbase, Binance, or KuCoin. Afterward,
transfer the ETH from the exchange to your wallet.

CONNECT TO UNISWAP

With your Ethereum wallet in place and connected to Uniswap, you are ready to
exchange your ETH for FUFU tokens. The exciting part is that there are no
taxes or hidden fees involved in swapping to or from $FUFU. Enjoy the benefits
of owning FUFU tokens without any additional costs!

SWAP ETH TO FUFU

Now that you have an Ethereum wallet, you own ETH and you are connected to
Uniswap, you can now swap ETH to FUFU. There are no taxes for swaps to and
from FUFU, so you can enjoy your FUFU tokens with no hidden fees!
